extended_tooltips.text: Soulflare: Strikes an enemy with a soulflare, dealing <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielFireball_Damage.amount" style="Red"/> area damage. 50% of inflicted damage is gained back as life.

Soulblade: Augments weapon to attack <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielSoulblade_Buff.modifiers[0].amount"/>% faster. While augmented weapon attack also inflicts a <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielSoulblade_WpnStun.duration"/> second stun. Lasts <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielSoulblade_Buff.duration"/> seconds.

Reinforce: Summons <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielDarkKri_Create.spawn_count"/> Kuzari to attack enemies.
Kuzari have <d ref="duckiesCloneDarkKri.vital_health.maximum"/> life and deal <d ref="duckiesCloneDarkKri_WeaponDamage.amount"/> damage per attack.

Cull The Unworthy: Purges target, inflicting <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielCull_Damage.amount" style="Red"/> damage and restoring his own life based on damage dealt. Ability cooldown scales with target's life.

Effect is diminished against resilient and hero targets.

name: Spectral Warrior Arkhos
tooltip:
Soulflare: Strikes an enemy with a soulflare, dealing <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielFireball_Damage.amount" style="Red"/> area damage. 50% of inflicted damage is gained back as life.

Soulblade: Augments weapon to attack <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielSoulblade_Buff.modifiers[0].amount"/>% faster. While augmented weapon attack also inflicts a <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielSoulblade_WpnStun.duration"/> second stun. Lasts <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielSoulblade_Buff.duration"/> seconds.

Reinforce: Summons <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielDarkKri_Create.spawn_count"/> Kuzari to attack enemies.
Kuzari have <d ref="duckiesCloneDarkKri.vital_health.maximum"/> life and deal <d ref="duckiesCloneDarkKri_WeaponDamage.amount"/> damage per attack.

Cull The Unworthy: Purges target, inflicting <d ref="duckiesCloneKastielCull_Damage.amount" style="Red"/> damage and restoring his own life based on damage dealt. Ability cooldown scales with target's life.
Effect is diminished against resilient and hero targets.
